sn51.77-86:1.5: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya cattaro iddhipada bhavetabba.
sn51.77-86:1.7: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamadhippadhanasankharasamannagatam iddhipadam bhaveti,
sn51.77-86:1.11: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam uddhambhagiyanam samyojananam abhinnaya parinnaya parikkhayaya pahanaya ime cattaro iddhipada bhavetabba”ti.
